Description: Purple glass intaglio; obverse: at right, an altar on which is a flower-pot with three plant stalks, tied to one of which is an ibis to left; reverse: a Greek inscription in three lines.
Curator's comments: Parallels: C. Bonner, Studies in Magical Amulets, Chiefly Graeco-Egyptian (Ann Arbor 1950) pl.4.
Bibliographic references: Faraone 2017 / Some Magical Gems in London (43)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr Laurie A Lawrence
